question.content: The vicious cycle of poverty refers to the situation where ||| those who are poor will trapped in poverty. ||| |||

solution.content: ‘will remain trapped’ should be used in place of ‘will ||| trapped’. ||| The given situation refers to the future & we never use V 3 directly ||| with ‘will’. ||| Future Tense ( Subject + shall/will + V1 + object / Subject + ||| shall/will + not + V1 +object ) |||

question.content: There was a time when it was fashionable to have a ||| dainty dog, like as the poodles or any other tiny creature as a ||| pet. |||

solution.content: ‘such as a poodle’ should be used. ||| ‘Such’ is followed by ‘as’. ||| ‘A dainty dog’ has been used. So, a singular noun (poodle) will be ||| used and not (poodles) |||
